item.title: EXCLUSIVE AdvisorShares Portfolio Manager Says Market 'Nervous' In 2025, Encourages Investors To Have 'Long-Term Focus' - AdvisorShares Focused Equity ETF (ARCACWS)

item.description: Advice for Investors: With the stock market experiencing high volatility in 2025, Elfenbein provided some advice for investors during the interview. item.description: IBCA monitors and replicates the Bloomberg December 2035 Maturity Corporate Index but can also hold U.S. government securities, short-term paper, cash or cash equivalents, and money market funds.
